short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly look up PIL-USA light fixture.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension created to save a couple of clicks when navigating the Performance In Lighting Website. It allows the user to enter a part number and be directed to the web page for that product number.
